name: Blogtimes
author: Matt Mullenweg

sections.description: This plugin generates a bar graph image showing when posts are made during a period of time. For this to work wp-images/blogtimes.png must be writable by the web server. Original code by Sanjay Sheth of sastools.com.

short_description: This plugin generates a bar graph image showing when posts are made during a period of time. For this to work wp-images/blogtimes.png must be writable by the web server. Original code by Sanjay Sheth of sastools.com.
